For performance reasons, please take photos at the medium level of resolution , preferably 6M (6 Megapixel)
Please do this 15-second registration once so that you can later explore the Citizense platform with its interesting campaigns and surprising rewards

Thank you very much for installing this app. This experiment on the participation of citizen will finish on 14 June 2017. You are invited to complete the campaigns. In return, you have chances to get some rewards from us, the organizer of this experiment.

A campaign can be created by the city hall of Castellón, UJI, the organizer of this experiment, you or your friends. Some campaigns will have a certain type of incentive, which is explained when you click on the campaign itself.
Due to our small budget, there is an upper bound for the money that you can receive for certain campaigns. However, we do appreciate your contribution very much.

Please check your account regularly to see your earned rewards (by clicking the button "Check my account"). After the end of the experiment, you can collect your rewards (cash and/or gifts) at Espaitec 2 building (UJI campus), ground floor, from 10.00am to 2.00pm everyday from 15 to 19 June 2017
If you have any doubts, questions or suggestions, please fell free to contact us at citizense.info@gmail.com
Once again, thank you very much for your time and effort !!
Your results were not recorded as you submit too quickly
This campaign was created by: anonymous author
Gifts will be delivered after the deadline of the campaign:
